body.text: Heyy, I'm gonna make it easier for you to tell everyone about your absence. I'll also be assisting you through the process. These are the list of commands i can respond to:

**'1'** or **customizePTOFavouriteSpacesList** to create/edit a list of favourite spaces. These are the spaces in which I will post your absence message. Make sure to add me in the spaces you want to post your PTO message, or else I won't be able to post there.
**'2'** or **customizeBackupPOCList** to create/edit a list of backup folks. A list that contains names of collegues to be contacted during your absence.
**'3'** or **generatePTOCardForToday** to create a PTO for today only. It can be full day, half day, or just a few hours.
**'4'** or **generatePTOCardForDuration** to create a PTO for a **Duration**.
**'5'** or **help** to find the list of commands I can respond to.

_And thats it, you're all set! Let me give you a few examples._ 

 Example 1: 
If you type '3' and schedule a time off for a few hours today, that message will instantly be posted in all your favourite spaces! 

 Example 2: 
If you type '4' and schedule a leave for a duration of one or more days, I'll be posting your PTO message at '9AM IST' everyday between entered duration in all your favourite spaces.

**Please DO NOT issue welcomeMembers command.
 It is to be used ONLY by whoever adds the bot to the space.**
